text: Ezɨ nɨ na ko ikiava, nan arazir kɨ manmaghɨn gumazamizibar sure gamim, nɨ a gɨfo. Nan dabirabir arazim nɨ a gɨfo, egha uaghan nan arazibar mɨngarim sara. Nɨ fo, kɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn iti, egha zurara uan navim gavgavim a ganɨga ingangarim gami. Egha kɨ igharaz darazigh ifuegha, tugha gavgavigha osɨmtɨziba ateri.
